column1: SW260 ASCOT TO ASH VALE JUNCTION
Down trains exceeding five cars must not be timed to stop for more than 1⁄2 minute to avoid blocking the levelcrossing

column2: 45 seconds* to be shown as alternate 1⁄2 and 1 minute dwells

column1: * Increase to 1 minute for services departing between 0700-0900 or 1600-1830 (both SX only)
